original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical systems, blending strategic acumen with hands-on technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective, efficient system configurations that drive organizational success. Your ability to collaborate cross-functionally, identify optimization opportunities, and implement technical solutions will be instrumental in ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them clearly, and develop comprehensive configuration specifications
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively liaise with cross-functional stakeholders
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in Java and SQL to implement and maintain system configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop innovative, data-driven solutions
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies to thrive in a fast-paced, iterative environment
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration processes to provide industry-specific expertise

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business analysis, system configuration, and data analysis
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical solutions
- Experience in implementing and troubleshooting complex system configurations

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems or processes
- Familiarity with Agile project management methodologies and tools

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration
- SQL, database querying, and data visualization tools
- Agile project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with frequent stakeholder interactions
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to drive project deliverables
- Willingness to adapt to changing priorities and requirements in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

Role Overview:
This role is a strategic and technical powerhouse, responsible for bridging the gap between business needs and system capabilities. As a key member of our team, you will leverage your deep understanding of complex business processes and your proficiency in cutting-edge technologies to design and implement innovative system configurations that drive organizational efficiency and growth. Your ability to analyze data, identify optimization opportunities, and translate requirements into effective technical solutions will be instrumental in ensuring our systems remain agile and responsive to evolving business needs.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to gather comprehensive business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and develop detailed configuration specifications
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues
- Leverage advanced data analysis techniques, such as database querying, reporting, and data visualization, to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement within existing systems
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, leading user acceptance testing (UAT) efforts and providing comprehensive feedback
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and effective ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business processes and devise effective technical solutions
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to work effectively with cross-functional teams
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical stakeholders
- Expertise in Java and SQL to design, implement, and maintain sophisticated system configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Experience in leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop data-driven, innovative solutions
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and tools to thrive in a fast-paced, iterative environment
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration processes and best practices to provide industry-specific expertise

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5-7 years of experience in a similar role, with a proven track record of translating business requirements into successful technical implementations
- Demonstrated expertise in developing, testing, and troubleshooting complex system configurations
- Experience in leading cross-functional teams and driving project deliverables

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems or processes
- Familiarity with Agile project management methodologies and tools

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration
- Advanced data analysis tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Agile project management software (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, fast-paced, and dynamic team environment with frequent stakeholder interactions
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to drive strategic initiatives and deliver high-impact projects
- Willingness to adapt to changing priorities and requirements, demonstrating a proactive and innovative mindset

Role Overview:
This role is a strategic and technical powerhouse, responsible for driving innovation and optimization within our complex business systems. As a key member of our team, you will leverage your deep understanding of industry-specific business processes and your proficiency in cutting-edge technologies to design and implement transformative system configurations that propel our organization forward. Your ability to analyze data, identify optimization opportunities, and translate requirements into effective technical solutions will be instrumental in ensuring our systems remain agile, efficient, and responsive to evolving business needs.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to gather comprehensive business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and develop detailed configuration specifications
- Translate business requirements into innovative technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues
- Leverage advanced data analysis techniques, such as database querying, reporting, and data visualization, to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for optimization within existing systems
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the implementation of cutting-edge technologies, configuration changes, and industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, leading user acceptance testing (UAT) efforts and providing comprehensive feedback
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and effective ongoing support of system configurations
- Serve as a subject matter expert and thought leader, providing strategic guidance and technical expertise to drive continuous improvement and innovation

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills to understand complex business processes and devise effective, innovative technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to work effectively with cross-functional teams and influence key stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Expertise in Java and SQL to design, implement, and maintain sophisticated system configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Proven experience in leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop data-driven, cutting-edge solutions
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and tools to thrive in a fast-paced, iterative environment
- In-depth knowledge of vehicle configuration processes and best practices to provide industry-leading expertise

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7-10 years of experience in a similar role, with a proven track record of translating business requirements into transformative technical implementations
- Demonstrated expertise in developing, testing, and troubleshooting complex system configurations, including the implementation of innovative solutions
- Experience in leading cross-functional teams and driving strategic initiatives to successful completion

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems or processes, with a deep understanding of industry trends and best practices
- Familiarity with Agile project management methodologies and tools, as well as experience in driving continuous improvement and innovation

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration
- Advanced data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Agile project management software (e.g., Jira, Trello)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, fast-paced, and dynamic team environment with frequent stakeholder interactions
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to drive strategic initiatives and deliver transformative projects
- Willingness to adapt to changing priorities and requirements, demonstrating a proactive, innovative, and forward-thinking mindset
- Serve as a subject matter expert and thought leader, providing strategic guidance and technical expertise to drive continuous improvement and industry-leading solutions
